name: Dice War
description:
Instructions- Click the play button at the top left corner to run the dice war game. Follow the corresponding text instructions at the bottom of the link. FYI- Might have to maximize the bottom length of the screen upwards to see text.

Controls- Press "R" to roll the dice. After the dice has been rolled hit the play button again and to roll press "R" again.

What to do- Continue playing while it keeps track of who's getting a higher score (you or the cpu) Set a winning score to decide when the game is over.

Genre- Completely chance based game

Assignment- Special topics game #3
